verses.verse: מִכְתָּ֥ם <S%H4387><s%> Michtam לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David שָֽׁמְרֵ֥נִי <S%H8104><s%> Preserve אֵ֝֗ל <S%H410><s%> me O God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for חָסִ֥יתִי <S%H2620><s%> for in thee do I put my trust בָֽךְ׃

אָמַ֣רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> [O my soul] thou hast said לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> Thou [art] my Lord אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you ט֝וֹבָתִ֗י <S%H2896><s%> my goodness בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> have no עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> besides

לִ֭קְדוֹשִׁים <S%H6918><s%> [But] to the saints אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [are] in the earth הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> that וְ֝אַדִּירֵ֗י <S%H117><s%> and [to] the excellent כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> is all חֶפְצִי־ <S%H2656><s%> in whom [is] all my delight בָֽם׃

יִרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> shall be multiplied עַצְּבוֹתָם֮ <S%H6094><s%> Their sorrows אַחֵ֪ר <S%H312><s%> [after] another מָ֫הָ֥רוּ <S%H4116><s%> [that] hasten בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> nor אַסִּ֣יךְ <S%H5258><s%> will I not offer נִסְכֵּיהֶ֣ם <S%H5262><s%> [god] their drink offerings מִדָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> of blood וּֽבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> Nor אֶשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> take up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁ֝מוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8034><s%> their names עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon שְׂפָתָֽי׃ <S%H8193><s%> into my lips

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מְנָת־ <S%H4490><s%> [is] the portion חֶלְקִ֥י <S%H2506><s%> of mine inheritance וְכוֹסִ֑י <S%H3563><s%> and of my cup אַ֝תָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> You תּוֹמִ֥יךְ <S%H8551><s%> thou maintainest גּוֹרָלִֽי׃ <S%H1486><s%> my lot

חֲבָלִ֣ים <S%H2256><s%> The lines נָֽפְלוּ־ <S%H5307><s%> are fallen לִ֭י בַּנְּעִמִ֑ים <S%H5273><s%> unto me in pleasant אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Indeed נַ֝חֲלָ֗ת <S%H5159><s%> heritage שָֽׁפְרָ֥ה <S%H8231><s%> [places] yea I have a goodly עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

אֲבָרֵ֗ךְ <S%H1288><s%> I will bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יְעָצָ֑נִי <S%H3289><s%> who hath given me counsel אַף־ <S%H637><s%> Indeed לֵ֝יל֗וֹת <S%H3915><s%> me in the night seasons יִסְּר֥וּנִי <S%H3256><s%> also instruct כִלְיוֹתָֽי׃ <S%H3629><s%> my reins

שִׁוִּ֬יתִי <S%H7737><s%> I have set יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְנֶגְדִּ֣י <S%H5048><s%> before תָמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> always כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because מִֽ֝ימִינִ֗י <S%H3225><s%> before me because [he is] at my right hand בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> I shall not be moved

לָכֵ֤ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore שָׂמַ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> is glad לִ֭בִּי <S%H3820><s%> Therefore my heart וַיָּ֣גֶל <S%H1523><s%> rejoiceth כְּבוֹדִ֑י <S%H3519><s%> and my glory אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also בְּ֝שָׂרִ֗י <S%H1320><s%> my flesh יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> also shall rest לָבֶֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> in hope

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor תַעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> For thou wilt not leave נַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> my soul לִשְׁא֑וֹל <S%H7585><s%> in hell לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> neither wilt thou suffer חֲ֝סִידְךָ֗ <S%H2623><s%> thine Holy One לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see שָֽׁחַת׃ <S%H7845><s%> corruption

תּֽוֹדִיעֵנִי֮ <S%H3045><s%> Thou wilt shew אֹ֤רַח <S%H734><s%> me the path חַ֫יִּ֥ים <S%H2416><s%> of life שֹׂ֣בַע <S%H7648><s%> [is] fulness שְׂ֭מָחוֹת <S%H8057><s%> of joy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> in thy presence נְעִמ֖וֹת <S%H5273><s%> [there are] pleasures בִּימִינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> at thy right hand נֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> for evermore
